item.title: Granite Guardian
item.description: Granite Guardian: Open-source risk detection models for LLMs, surpassing existing models in accuracy and offering comprehensive coverage across multiple risk dimensions, promoting safer AI.

item.title: DELIFT: Data Efficient Language model Instruction Fine Tuning
item.description: DELIFT: Data Efficient Language Model Instruction Fine-Tuning, drastically reduces the data needed for effective LLM fine-tuning without sacrificing performance.
